messages.subject: Inoue Genzaburo + Rintaro Okita Document
messages.msgSnippet: originally from http://8614.teacup.com/hijikata/bbs pic of document and location of discovery http://blog.drecom.jp/hinojyukuhonjin_kentoukai/ {Tama} gave a
messages.messageBody:
originally from
http://8614.teacup.com/hijikata/bbs

pic of document and location of discovery
http://blog.drecom.jp/hinojyukuhonjin_kentoukai/

{Tama} gave a quick summary............

the document is a {{copy}} of an original
the original has -not- been discovered

the document is a petiton signed when Roushi tai was formed around
Kiyokawa

what we know now is that Inoue Genazaburo and *Rintaro Okita's names
are on the list

*Rintaro Okita was Okita Mitsu's husband.....basically Okita's
brother-in-law

it was discovered in an old house in the Yamanashi Prefecture

the house was owned by the descendent of Hayakawa Buntaro (1st unit
Roushi tai)

a historian visited the home and the {{copy}} was discovered
